text: Itak, My vnushili tebe cherez Otkroveniye yasnyy, istinnyy Koran na arabskom yazyke, chtoby ty uveshcheval zhiteley Mekki i arabov, kotoryye zhivut v yeyo okrestnostyakh, i uveshcheval lyudey o nakazanii v Den', kogda Allakh soberot lyudey dlya rasplaty. Etot Den' nepremenno nastanet, i net somneniya v nom. V tot Den' lyudi razdelyatsya na dve chasti: odna voydot v ray, a drugaya budet vvergnuta v ad
